frontmatter.name: Advertising and Copywriting
frontmatter.description: Understand how to make great campaigns and write effective copy for different social media platforms. Secure a career in Advertising, or perform better creatively. For business owners, generating digital leads through great communication will be a breeze.
frontmatter.card_description: Secure a career in Advertising. For business owners, generating digital leads through great communication will be a breeze.

frontmatter.name: Aarushi Nayyar
frontmatter.bio: Aarushi is a storyteller by passion, copywriter by profession and journalist by education. She has worked with some of the biggest brands in the industry such as Coca-Cola and Marlboro. Mostly, sheâ€™s found by a river stream curled up with a good book but has peeped out of her cave to share her knowledge in the world of advertising

frontmatter.name: Art of Selling
frontmatter.description: A course tailor made to make you super productive from day #1. This is bound to push your adrenaline levels up and get you cracking on those super deals. Sales is the most important function as it generates revenue.
frontmatter.card_description: A course tailor made to make you super productive from day #1. This is bound to push your adrenaline levels up and get you cracking on those super deals.

frontmatter.name: Sid Baliga
frontmatter.bio: "Sid Baliga, an alumnus of MIT Manipal and IIM Kozhikode, has worked in Sales & Marketing for over a decade. He has authored 2 novels, published bylines in The Times of India, Assam Tribune, and ICFAI University Press, and was quoted in Deccan Herald for his expertise in Leadership Resume Development and International Admission SOPs. He is also a Content Marketing Consultant for EdTech Startups.

frontmatter.name: Business Management
frontmatter.description: Have you got an idea or are you longing to solve an impending problem? Learn about the key aspects of business and entrepreneurship, from finance to marketing, to advance or start your career in the business world.
frontmatter.card_description: Learn about the key aspects of business and entrepreneurship, from finance to marketing.

frontmatter.name: Rahul Varma
frontmatter.bio: Co-Founder at Unschool, Rahul Varma is a Social Entrepreneur with experience in 2 successful start-ups right from his college days. He is also a TEDx speaker and has been the National Head of Operations for AIESEC in India. He is also a member of the United Nations SDSN Youth Solutions Hub and has mentored more than 1000 students in Entrepreneurship and Marketing.

frontmatter.name: Career Planning for Freshers
frontmatter.description: Create a career plan and choose your own dream career path with this course. Reflect on and enhance your self-awareness to excel in your career and your first job.
frontmatter.card_description: Reflect on and enhance your self-awareness to excel in your career and your first job.

frontmatter.name: Louise Mosseline
frontmatter.credentials: Consultant at Caron Perlon Consulting Pte. Ltd, Singapore.
frontmatter.bio:
"Louise is an HR consultant with experience +7yrs in consulting, L&D, people engagement, onboarding experience, performance management, and project management, having worked in Corporates, start-ups as well as NGOs, with a keen interest in talent development through L&D initiatives.

Helping companies build and optimize their people strategy and HR processes, she realized that most of issues companies go through start with people don't being aware of their strengths and how to use their gifted talents. This lack of self-awareness makes many freshers look for job opportunities and careers that are doesn't give the opportunity to unlock their potential and enhance their talents."

frontmatter.name: Content Writing & Marketing
frontmatter.description: Do you see content while you observe things happening around and have a way with your words? Weave them into a career with Content Writing & Marketing course and learn how to market your business, your product, and yourself!
frontmatter.card_description: Do you see content while you observe things happening around and have a way with your words?

frontmatter.name: Sharvan TG
frontmatter.bio: Sharvan TG is an experienced Digital Marketer, Entrepreneur, and Writer. He is an inquisitive person who has experience in authoring books, creating effective content and generating traffic for various clients. As a Co-Founder of his own Digital Marketing firm, he has a good experience working with reputed organisations with several freelancing projects.

frontmatter.name: Digital Marketing
frontmatter.description: Mark the digital print of your brand by learning the new age marketing skills that open limitless possibilities!
frontmatter.card_description: Mark the digital print of your brand by learning the new age marketing skills that open limitless possibilities!

frontmatter.name: Ishan Singh
frontmatter.bio: Ishan Singh is a Manager - Marketing & Growth at Scripbox. As a Digital Marketer, he has had experiences around the domains of Search Engine Optimisation, Branding, PR, and Inbound marketing. Ishan is also an AIESECer having led a student community in different colleges in Chennai and beyond.

frontmatter.name: Human Rights and Duties
frontmatter.description: Human rights education is a process that builds up the required knowledge, values, and proficiency of human rights of which the objective is to develop an acceptable human rights culture, Along with providing support your fellow human.
frontmatter.card_description: Learn the process that builds up the required knowledge, values, and proficiency of human rights.

frontmatter.name: Dr. Swati Chakraborty
frontmatter.teaches: Human Rights & Duties and Political Sociology
frontmatter.credentials: Assistant Professor at Human Rights and Women Studies,Schoolguru Eduserve Pvt. Ltd.  International Fellow, KAICIID,Vienna.
frontmatter.bio: Swati is the Faculty and Faculty Coordinator, Schoolguru Eduserve Pvt. Ltd. India along with being Vice President- South East Asia Eurasian and Doctoral Summer Academy (EDSA). She has also worked with the National Human Rights Commission India, Director- International Relations and Campaign, NVP, India, and International Fellow, KAICIID, Vienna. She's an avid Human Rights activist.

frontmatter.name: Lean Six Sigma: White Belt Certification
frontmatter.description: Earn your Lean Six Sigma White Belt today and become a skilled and valuable employee with this course. Master the greatest benchmark for quality. Learn Six Sigma now!
frontmatter.card_description: Earn your Lean Six Sigma White Belt today and become a skilled and valuable employee with this course. Master the greatest benchmark for quality. Learn Six Sigma now!

frontmatter.name: Amanda Zimmerman
frontmatter.teaches: Lean Six Sigma: White Belt Certification
frontmatter.credentials: Certified Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt
frontmatter.bio: Amanda Zimmerman is a Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt in Oregon. She has worked with maintenance and reliability teams in the US and has mentored Green Belts in Angola. She did her Global MBA from Imperial College of London.  She has demonstrated more than a quarter of a billion dollars in annual benefit for her clients.

frontmatter.name: Marketing Management
frontmatter.description: Know about the journey to generate profits from planning, organizing, executing and controlling different Marketing strategies
frontmatter.card_description: Learn the journey to generate profits from planning, organising, executing & controlling different Marketing strategies.

frontmatter.bio: A Portuguese Marketing Consultant, Miguel has a portfolio of 20+ marketing and sales projects. He is also the proud Co-Founder and Strategy Advisor at Base IPAM, the first Marketing Junior Consultancy in Portugal. He has mentored more than 30 junior marketing consultants in Portugal.

frontmatter.name: Psychology
frontmatter.description: A growing field, Psychology is  a rewarding career which is high in-demand. Take this course to learn about the theories and practical working knowledge of Psychology.
frontmatter.card_description: Take this course to learn about the theories and practical working knowledge of Psychology.

frontmatter.name: Harshita Lalchand
frontmatter.credentials: Certified Behavioural Psychologist, NLP Practitioner and a Mental Space Psychologist
frontmatter.bio: Harshita is a certified Behavioural skills trainer having delivered over 3500 hours of training.  She has helped transform over 1600 lives across different locations in India. The delegates of her sessions include corporate employees, students and faculty members of leading Business Schools. She is a certified Behavioural Psychologist, NLP Practitioner and a Mental Space Psychologist. She also has experience as a Moderator and an Emcee at Corporate events and conclaves.

frontmatter.name: Product Development
frontmatter.description: Converting a raw idea to the selling product service is a long and complex journey! Make it simple and effective with this course!
frontmatter.card_description: Converting a raw idea to the selling product service is a long and complex journey! Make it simple and effective with this course!

frontmatter.name: Zahin Hussain
frontmatter.bio: Zahin is an impact-driven entrepreneur working on solutions to facilitate pathways for study abroad opportunities in Asia. She was previously responsible for the development of an entrepreneurship sandbox in South Korea that provides access to training, networks and funding to get entrepreneurs from idea to a proof of concept. She has designed 5 global start-up boot camps with over 80 aspiring entrepreneurs from over 10 countries, engaging with 30 experts from industry. The program provided $30,000 of seed funding to 5 student-led startups, with two of them generating revenue within one year.

frontmatter.name: Public Relations
frontmatter.description: Become a Public Relations expert with a course packed with case studies, statistics, checklists, templates and practical activities that bring theory to life.
frontmatter.card_description: Become a Public Relations expert with a course packed with case studies, statistics, checklists, templates and practical activities that bring theory to life.

frontmatter.name: Pooja Pathak
frontmatter.bio:
Pooja Pathak is the Co-founder of Media Mantra,  the 9th fastest-growing PR firm in the world & the 2nd fastest in Asia. She is a highly qualified professional with over 11 years of experience & has dabbled in fields of Media relations. 

A keen interest in writing and communications led her into the world of PR.   She believes an essential part of being an entrepreneur is to listen to your inner calling while staying strong and determined to achieve the goals. Driving one of the fastest-growing PR companies in the country, Pooja Pathak is a source of inspiration for many young and aspiring women entrepreneurs.

frontmatter.name: Soft Skills
frontmatter.description: Soft skills are very necessary to develop a good personality as well as to succeed in your profession. From career enhancement to cracking interviews, learn it all, with this course.
frontmatter.card_description: Soft skills are very necessary to develop a good personality as well as to succeed in your profession.

frontmatter.name: Narayanan S
frontmatter.credentials: Co-Founder and Chief Business Officer at Unschool
frontmatter.bio: Co-Founder at Unschool, Narayanan is an expert in B2B Marketing, Sales, and has worked with brands like Coca-Cola, Axiata Group, Bookings.com, Lonely Planet etc. He is a young entrepreneur and a youth leadership enthusiast, having held leadership spaces for over 10000 students in India and Nepal. As the head of Business Development at AIESEC India, Narayanan managed 20+ Local Chapter teams. At his most recent role at Clap Global as the Chief Marketing Officer, he strategized key acquisition campaigns and advertisements.

frontmatter.name: Stock Market & Finance
frontmatter.description: Simplify and resolve the world of finance and stock markets by acquiring skills to make smart investments! A belief that you can succeed in investing and a career in Finance is the key.
frontmatter.card_description: Simplify and resolve the world of finance and stock markets by acquiring skills to make smart investments!

frontmatter.name: Himanshu Raghani
frontmatter.credentials: SEBI Certified Investment Advisor & Stock Research Analyst
frontmatter.bio: Himanshu Raghani is a Gold Medallist at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels. With 5 years of excellent academic background in the field of Financial Markets and 4 years of investing experience in the Indian Stock Market, he aims to leverage his education and abilities to expand financial literacy in various ways and to seek financial independence for people at large.
